# abmiscr

The goal of abmiscr is to provide a suite of functions that are useful in Adrien Bouissou's workflow.

## Installation

You can install the development version of abmiscr from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("abouissou/abmiscr")
```
